## bytesToBase64url() function

Converts a Uint8Array to a base64url string

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function bytesToBase64url(b: Uint8Array): string
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type       | Description               |
| --------- | ---------- | ------------------------- |
| b         | Uint8Array | the array to be converted |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
